name: Amalgamonsters
description:
Amalgamonsters is a game where players are mad scientists that are competing to create the strongest monster by taking turns attaching limbs to their monster,  enhancing their monster's development, and attacking other monsters. Only the strongest monster will live.

Amalgamonsters can be played with 2-6 players and is a party game that is suited for all ages. 

https://tabletopia.com/playground/amalgamonsters-dbj6u6/play-now
